meanings.definition: The quality or state of being preternatural.
meanings.sent1: The preternaturalnesses of the ghostly figure sent shivers down my spine.
meanings.sent2: The town's folklore is filled with tales of preternaturalnesses.
meanings.sent3: The preternaturalnesses of the talking animals in the story made me chuckle.
meanings.sent4: Her preternaturalnesses in predicting the future seemed almost magical.
meanings.sent5: The preternaturalnesses of the glowing orb in the sky left everyone in awe.

meanings.definition: Instances of preternatural occurrences or phenomena.
meanings.sent1: The book was full of preternaturalnesses that kept me on the edge of my seat.
meanings.sent2: The investigators were baffled by the preternaturalnesses they encountered at the haunted house.
meanings.sent3: The preternaturalnesses of the alien invasion in the movie were both thrilling and entertaining.
meanings.sent4: The preternaturalnesses of the storm's power were beyond anything we had ever seen.
meanings.sent5: The preternaturalnesses of the mysterious disappearances in the town were the talk of the community.
